Familiar Surge.name: Familiar Surge
Familiar Surge.fullText:
Familiar Keeper Attack 11Familiar Surge

Pure magical essence explodes from your familiar, opening the path for future attacks against creatures caught in the arcane mists.

Encounter        Arcane, Implement
Standard Action      Close burst 1 or blast 3

Special: Your familiar must be in active mode, and the origin square of the burst or blast is the familiar’s square.

Target: Each creature in the burst or blast

Attack: Intelligence, Wisdom, or Charisma vs. Reflex

Hit: 3d8 + Intelligence, Wisdom, or Charisma modifier damage. Until the end of your next turn, creatures adjacent to your familiar grant combat advantage to you and your allies.

Special: When you gain this power, choose Intelligence, Wisdom, or Charisma as the ability score you use when making attack rolls and damage rolls with this power.


Published in Dragon Magazine 374, page(s) 32.
Familiar Surge.flavor: Pure magical essence explodes from your familiar, opening the path for future attacks against creatures caught in the arcane mists.
Familiar Surge.special: When you gain this power, choose Intelligence, Wisdom, or Charisma as the ability score you use when making attack rolls and damage rolls with this power.
Familiar Surge.target: Each creature in the burst or blast
Familiar Surge.attack: Intelligence, Wisdom, or Charisma vs. Reflex
Familiar Surge.onHit: 3d8 + Intelligence, Wisdom, or Charisma modifier damage. Until the end of your next turn, creatures adjacent to your familiar grant combat advantage to you and your allies.

Transpose Familiar.name: Transpose Familiar
Transpose Familiar.fullText:
Familiar Keeper Utility 12Transpose Familiar

Two runed circles appear—one under your feet and another under your familiar—and you instantly teleport to one another’s location.

Daily        Arcane, Teleportation
Move Action      Personal

Special: Your familiar must be in active mode.

Effect: You trade places with your familiar. You can then also move your familiar up to its speed as part of the move action to use this power.


Published in Dragon Magazine 374, page(s) 32.
Transpose Familiar.flavor: Two runed circles appear—one under your feet and another under your familiar—and you instantly teleport to one another’s location.
Transpose Familiar.special: Your familiar must be in active mode.
Transpose Familiar.effect: You trade places with your familiar. You can then also move your familiar up to its speed as part of the move action to use this power.

Familiar's Command.name: Familiar's Command
Familiar's Command.fullText:
Familiar Keeper Attack 20Familiar's Command

Your familiar turns into a mist of arcane energy and flows into your foe, taking over its mind.

Daily        Arcane, Charm, Implement
Standard Action      Melee 1

Special: Your familiar must be in active mode, and the attack comes from the familiar’s square instead of yours.

Target: One creature

Attack: Intelligence, Wisdom, or Charisma vs. Will

Hit: The target is dominated (save ends). Your familiar returns to passive mode, and it can’t return to active mode while the target is dominated.

Miss: You can choose to return your familiar to passive mode. If you do, this power is not expended.

Special: When you gain this power, choose Intelligence, Wisdom, or Charisma as the ability score you use when making attack rolls with this power.


Published in Dragon Magazine 374, page(s) 32.
Familiar's Command.flavor: Your familiar turns into a mist of arcane energy and flows into your foe, taking over its mind.
Familiar's Command.special: When you gain this power, choose Intelligence, Wisdom, or Charisma as the ability score you use when making attack rolls with this power.
Familiar's Command.attack: Intelligence, Wisdom, or Charisma vs. Will
Familiar's Command.onHit: The target is dominated (save ends). Your familiar returns to passive mode, and it can’t return to active mode while the target is dominated.
Familiar's Command.onMiss: You can choose to return your familiar to passive mode. If you do, this power is not expended.
